name: AR Platform (Quest 2)
description:
Push the left thumbstick down to lock yourself in place. Then use the left thumbstick to move character. "A "button on Right controller jumps. You can grab the platforms and move them around to make your own platform level. 

Need to use Sidequest to load the project onto your Quest. 

Enable Passthrough on your headset to enjoy the Augmented Reality aspect of the project.
